title: Perfectly Fractured (The Imperfect, #1).
description: Losing Sophie changed our family. We never saw it coming. We all had different ways of coping. My mother started a career that transformed our lives entirely. Her success as a motivational speaker brought wealth that my parents had always dreamed of. But with this wealth came great loneliness for the child that they left behind. When I met the Santiaros family my life drastically improved. Elliot became my childhood best friend and his parents Katerina and Lorenzo treated me like I was part of their family. They brought happiness into my life that had been absent since losing Sophie.On the night of Elliot’s graduation party, everything changed. The Santiaros family became distant and I could not dispel the feeling they were hiding something. When I accidentally discovered a book from the past, I realised that the Santiaros family had secrets. These secrets are the key to understanding the hidden danger lurking in their family.Will I discover the truth before it’s too late?
author: Krystalle Bianca
